reviews.review:
*****
Portal is a puzzle game, one of my favorite kind. I started playing Portal 2 and I loved it. So I decided to give Portal a try. And I totally recommend it, if you're like me, and like the challenge of thinking different ways to move forward and find the exit. Not only that, but everything is very creative: the gameplay, the story, Glados, ... The music at the end, hilarious! Fun for Sure!

*****
Portal é um jogo de estilo puzzle, um dos meus favoritos. Eu comecei a jogar Portal 2 e eu adorei. Então, eu decidi dar uma chance a Portal. E eu recomendo totalmente, se você é como eu, e gosta do desafio de pensar diferentes maneiras de avançar e encontrar a saída. Não só isso, mas tudo é muito criativo: a jogabilidade, a história, GLaDOS, ... A música no final, hilário! Diversão na certa!

This is still an excellent game by itself. It does the classic thing of showing you a bunch of tricks and skills and then testing your mastery of those skills at the end. But if you have to make a choice between this and Portal 2 then I would recommend the sequel. Portal is darker, cheeky in its think-fast-or-die encounters, and sometimes frustrating in its twitchy timed puzzles. I never felt comfortable trying to aim and shoot two portals under a very short window of time but this game makes you do it several times in the latter stages of the game. Portal 2 improves upon all of that removing most of the timing-action elements and telling a much deeper story.

I <3 Portal. Words can't describe how much I love Portal. If you are on the fense about trying it just buy it. You won't regret it. Yes, it's a short game, but it's so much fun. [h1] Inovador, Brilhante [/h1]

Por onde começar... 
Excelente gráficos pra epóca, tesselações e texturas muito bem definidas. Espetacular narração, monólogos exepcionais, com nossa querida GLADOS, uma personagem facinante, com um objetivo simples. Física assustadoramente perfeita. Até hoje em dia, alguns games pecam demais no quesito "física", más Portal, fez isso de um jeito magnânimo, apenas nas questões dos famosos portais, eu poderia citar centenas de elogios e pontos de vista positivos, más, é muito surreal para poder explicar. Um game inovador, divertido, e mesmo sendo um puro puzzle, é muito bom rachar a cabeça as vezes com algo tão legal como isso. Eu adorei este game, eu recomendo para qualquer um.

Un livello tira l'altro.
Ormai Portal lo conoscono tutti, così come il gameplay di base, semplice e geniale. 
E' uno di quei titoli che vi farà pronunciare ad oltranza il fatidico "ancora un livello e poi spengo"; ma invece... Probabile semmai che il gioco (non lunghissimo) finiate per ultimarlo praticamente in un sol fiato.
Non guasta poi che ci sia anche una "trama"in questa sorta di puzzle game, nel suo piccolo anche abbastanza appassionante, e dipanata con un pizzico di ironia che non guasta mai.
Un must, adatto a chiunque. Non fatevelo scappare, soprattutto se lo beccate (come spesso accade) scontato.
un gioco fantastico; semplicemente unico e perfetto.

Most of it may be simple but being thrown through portals and landing on a side I didn't think I'd make it over to had me feeling so accomplished. I can't wait to start Portal 2

Pretty much a classic game already , innovative and fun gameplay. Nice psyhics. 9/10.

El concepto de portal es uno de los más interesantes que eh podido llegar a conocer, te da las herramientas necesarias para aprender las mecánicas con las que jugaras, pese a que su concepto es llegar de un punto A un punto B, atravesando varios obstáculos, una de las mejores cosas que ofrece portal es la libertada con la que cuentas para hacerlo, ninguna de mis partidas jugadas hasta la fecha es igual, haciendo entretenido descubrir nuevos modos de superar los desafíos esto y sumando sus otros modos de juego incrementan el valor de su reusabilidad, las buenas mecánicas del juego son acompañadas de una historia entretenida y pese a que la cantidad de personajes que realmente llegas a conocer se limita practicamente solo a uno, antagonista de la historia, este muestra un carisma casi inigualable haciendo que sea inolvidable toda tu aventura. En pocas palabras Portal es un juego divertido, entretenido, desafiante y muy recomendable.

The music is not the strongest point of this game. You'll have to dig a little deeper to figure out the whole story but to the average mind there is a simple story to discover. Full of fun 'thinking' puzzles but has a lack of content. It is nice that they added a few remixed challenge levels and achievements to keep us busy. It's worth the price their putting on it compared to portal 2 10/10
Portal and Portal 2 are amazing games. I really hope they continue this series with future products. The graphics, gameplay, and overal experience is amazing. I really enjoyed playing this!

I think Portal is an extremely good game to buy... when it goes on sale. I think the game is awesome; but it is just really short. I don't know if it is worth 10 dollars; your first playthrough should take about 3 or 4 hours at most. I think this is a good game to get either when it is on sale; or if you get it via the Orange Box.
A classic; one of my all-time favourites!

While the game is awfully short, there are 18 challenges and 6 advanced chambers to try out. Even after beating the game, you'll be pretty occupied for a while. Worth the $10.

Portal is a interesting puzzle game which lets players explore simulations of trickly puzzles that can be enjoyable or just damn annoying, when i wrote this review i have only played 45 hours so i havant completed all of the puzzles. Graphics great for its time and NO and I mean NO FPS DROPS, i could believe how well it ran and how smooth it ran even with very little (anti aliasing). As the first instoolment of the portal franchise i loved it. The only bad side was when i got stuck there was never a way to help myself and no hints so it resulted in youtube this and youtube that. 用传送枪在白色的墙上开一个蓝色的洞一个橙色的洞，就可以在两个洞之间连成一个异次元空间，在它们之间自由穿梭。

它的规则很简单。我想很多游戏都有很好的规则与点子，但传送门长于它们的一点在于画面足够精致，另外关卡存在的背景（光圈科技的工作狂机器人glados不断对主角进行实验测试）在不喧宾夺主的前提下渲染了游戏的氛围，所以传送门脱颖而出成为了经典。

该作流程较2来说很短，关卡房间和剧情结合的也不紧密，不过对单纯享受解谜过程的人来说绝对是佳作。
Mind scrambling with a sarcastic computer, what else would you need?

Awesome mechanics & controls and a great storytelling narrative.

I was late coming to this game. Didn't get to it until 2012 or so, and I feel like I waited too long to play this wonderful and witty piece. Gone are the traditional FPS rationals and motives; replaced with puzzles and physics. It's great. Seriously, get this game, and you'll be glad you did.

(Also, don't mind the Companion Cube there in the icon. I'm not biased or anything towards this game.

Get this game. It's awesome.
The puzzles are the right amount of challenging, interesting, and it tells a great story (you just may have to look for it a bit) The dialogue is very impressive for a game, and fortunately doesn't get repititive like many other games with character dialogue. The main character, Chell, is always silent, so it's up to you to decide who she might be, her personality, likes, and dislikes. This way, the character you play as can be anyone you want it to. The graphics are nice, they run okay and look good too. And GLaDOS, she is hilarious. Even if you hate dark humour, she makes it funny. Always. And the portals. Whoever came up with these portals is a genious. 

People have also said that the gameplay time is short (2 hours) but if you are like me and know nothing about Portal like I used to, it should get you 4-5 hours of gameplay time. And there's plenty of mods and stuff to keep you busy with it after you finish the game.

The only complaint I might have (I'm not sure if anything can be done about it, but if it can, it should have been done in 2011.) is that the art in Portal and Portal 2 are very different. As far as the story goes, all that SHOULD have happened would be the facility gets overgrown and ruined. However, many familiar things from the first game are changed to a different style in Portal 2, such as GLaDOS, the Cores, Doors, Elevators, etc. I feel both games should have been modified to have a more consistent art style, aside from the ruined and overgrown bits. (Either that or a decent explanation as to WHY things look different)

Overall, I recommend this game. BUT before you run off and buy it because of my persuasive and detailed arguement, get the Portal and Portal 2 bundle. It's a better deal, and once you finish Portal, you will be dying to get Portal 2.
